text: Hi..In nodesk, when confidentiality is turned on, the paylaod is encrypted using the tx key... Is it encrypting using peers public key?
Hi, payload is encrypted using ECIES (hybrid encryption)  and ultimately using a chain-specific public key
peers have access to the chain-specific private (decryption) key
tx key is the emphemeral key used in this case (wrapped with pkchain)

Hi, in <https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/sdk/node/src/hfc.ts> there's still a reference to hyperledger/fabric-baseimage. I recall someone saying that this image is going to be obsoleted; is this true?
<@U1BC5A0F9>  So if a client wants to decrypt the payload on his end how he can get access to the (chain specific) private key? Is there any way in sdk to get that through function call?
